Requirement is not verified Additional voltage measuremement values shall be transfered from RL78 to Chorus under SPI frame Diag Info - 0x05 â€“ Voltage Measurements (7 different measurements with ADC filtered values = 70 bits used) from a frame with 9 bytes (72 bits) - under following buffer layout: VDD_0V8 - 10 bits - start position bit 0 ... 9 VDD_DVFS - 10 bits - start position bit 10 ... 19 VDD_DDR_1V1 - 10 bits - start position bit 20 ... 29 VDD_DDR_1V8 - 10 bits - start position bit 30 ... 39 VDD_1V8 - 10 bits - start position bit 40 ... 49 VDD_2V5 - 10 bits - start position bit 50 ... 59 VDD_3V3_SW - 10 bits - start position bit 60 ... 69 ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_7596 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_11559

Requirement is not verified 0x000153 - Power Management internal error
IF the SW receives the signal 0x000153 from the External Watchdog via SPI communication AND the received status is CLEAR DTC THEN the SW shall set the DTC 0x000153 - Power Management internal error as De-Qualified.
Important Note: A different handling might be needed here, since the DTC can be set from two sources. If the DTC can be cleared from one source and the other source still wants to keep the DTC as Qualified there is a conflict.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_11559 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

Requirement is not verified 0x000121 - SPI interface to GW defective

After 3 subsequent client info over SPI_GW2WD answers, it shall set the DTC 0x000121 as De-Qualified. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_7339 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21243
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: SysWDDiag_FillDiagInfo ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Diag_Chorus_RL78/SysWDDiagnosis/c/inc/SysWDDiagnosis.h line 427 Requirement is satisfied here: SysWDDiag_FillDiagInfo ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Diag_Chorus_RL78/SysWDDiagnosis/c/src/SysWDDiagnosis.c line 357 Requirement is satisfied here: HardwareVersion_GetHardwareVersionNumber ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Diag_Chorus_RL78/SysWDDiagnosis/c/src/SysWDDiagnosis.c line 1469
Requirement is not verified After Startup, Chorus shall send cyclically the HW version to RL78 via Diagnostic Buffer until positive feedback is received from RL78. The buffer shall have the following format: Header:Bits 4-7 value 0x08 Header:Bits 0-3 value 0x03 Diagnostic Data: Byte 1-3: 3 bytes ASCII characters with the HW version number
Note:Feedback detailed in requirement SWR_ICAS1_GW_21252.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21243 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21252
sect2.para:

Requirement is not verified After receiving from RL78 the positive feedback that the HW version has been received, Chorus shall stop sending the HW version to RL78. Feedback information shall have the following format: Header.Bits4-7 value 0x08 (ID) Header.Bits0-3 value 0x01 (Length) Diagnostic Data:Byte 1:1 byte containing value 1 for a positive feedback
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21252 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21244
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: SysWDDiag_FillDiagInfo ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Diag_Chorus_RL78/SysWDDiagnosis/c/inc/SysWDDiagnosis.h line 429 Requirement is satisfied here: SysWDDiag_CrcWdg_CrcReq ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Diag_Chorus_RL78/SysWDDiagnosis/c/inc/SysWDDiagnosis.h line 1001 Requirement is satisfied here: SysWDDiag_ExtractRL78FBLVersion ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Diag_Chorus_RL78/SysWDDiagnosis/c/src/SysWDDiagnosis.c line 163 Requirement is satisfied here: HardwareVersion_GetHardwareVersionNumber ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Diag_Chorus_RL78/SysWDDiagnosis/c/src/SysWDDiagnosis.c line 1540 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Diag_Chorus_RL78/SysWDDiagnosis/c/src/SysWDDiagnosis.c line 1954
Requirement is not verified When Chorus receives from CRC32 Manager the signal s_RequestType with the values "recalculate" or "read/calculate" and the signal s_LogicalBlockId with value 0x11 then the Chorus shall request the CRC32 Hash value from SysWD via Diagnostic Buffer with the following format: Header: Bits 4-7 value 0x09 Header: Bits 0-3 value 0x01 Diagnostic Data: Byte 1: 1 byte with the CRC Request,containing the logical block ID for RL78.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21244 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21305
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: SysWDDiag_AnalyzeRL78DiagInfoFrame ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Diag_Chorus_RL78/SysWDDiagnosis/c/inc/SysWDDiagnosis.h line 292 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Diag_Chorus_RL78/SysWDDiagnosis/c/src/SysWDDiagnosis.c line 1955
Requirement is not verified Chorus shall receive the response of the CRC32 value from RL78 with the following format: Header: Bits 4-7 value 0x09 Header: Bits 0-3 value 0x04 Diagnostic Data:4 bytes with the CRC32 value. The Chorus shall send the value to the CRC32 manager with the signal s_LogicalBlockCRC32.
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21305 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21245
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: SysWDDiag_FillDiagInfo ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Diag_Chorus_RL78/SysWDDiagnosis/c/inc/SysWDDiagnosis.h line 425 Requirement is satisfied here: HardwareVersion_GetHardwareVersionNumber ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/cdd/Diag_Chorus_RL78/SysWDDiagnosis/c/src/SysWDDiagnosis.c line 1548
Requirement is not verified Chorus shall request DTC Resync to SysWD via Diagnostic Buffer with below mentioned format when the Diagnostic SW delete all DTCs stored in Chorus Header:Bits 4-7 value 0x07 Header:Bits 0-3 value 0x00
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_21245 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
